All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AbstractElement
Implementation of the Drawable interface associates a drawable object with a Renderer to use for drawing.
AssociatedElement
An associated element is an abstract base class to classes like FollowerElement or AttachedElement, that are associated with another "base" element such as a PlatformElement or a LiftElement.
AttachedElement
An attached element is one that is associated with another "base" element such as a PlatformElement or a LiftElement.
BaseElement
A base element is an abstract base class to classes like PlatformElement or LiftElement, with two distinctive behaviors.
BasicTest
 
CircleRenderer
Renderer that draws a solid circle in an element's bounding rectangle.
Drawable
Interface representing minimal features of something that can be drawn on a graphics context.
ElementTests
 
ExplosionRenderer
Renderer that changes the way something is drawn over time, gradually making it fade in to the background color.
FlyingElement
Moving element in which the vertical velocity is adjusted each frame by a gravitational constant to simulate gravity.
FlyingTest
 
FollowerElement
A follower element is one that is associated with another "base" element such as a PlatformElement or LiftElement.
GameBase
This is the base for other demos, it does not have a main() method, you can not run it directly.
ImageRenderer
Renderer implementation that will draw a given image within an element's bounding rectangle.
JumpExample1
Example using a "jumping" with a FlyingElement.
JumpExample2
Uses a FlyingElement to jump on a FollowerElement and an AttachedElement associated with a PlatformElement.
LiftElement
An element with two distinctive behaviors.
MazeExample
Using some BasicElements and a MovingElement to create a player in a maze.
MovingElement
An element in which the update method updates the position each frame according to a velocity vector (deltaX, deltaY).
PigsExample
Example of using an ImageRenderer with a BasicElement.
PlatformElement
A PlatformElement is an element with two distinctive behaviors.
PlatformExample
No controls, just a cool animation.
PlatformTest
 
PlatformWithAttachedTest
 
PlatformWithFollowerTest
 
Renderer
Interface represents a strategy for drawing a Drawable object into a given graphics context.
SimpleElement
Minimal concrete extension of AbstractElement.
SolidRenderer
Renderer that fills an element's bounding rectangle with a solid color.
SuperPigsExample
Demo of pretty much all the game elements in hw4.
VanishingElement
An element that does not move.
VanishingElementExample
Example of using VanishingElement.
WhenPigsFly
An attempt to experiment with the mechanics of the lovely game "Winter Bells" http://www.freewebarcade.com/game/winterbells/ Side-to-side motion of player is controlled by mouse.
